value: Let's dive in with a code sample

What will be the output of given Python code?
n=7
c=0
while(n):
 if(n>5):
  continue
 c+=1
 n-=1
print(c)

correct.value: Since n is 7 initially, it will encounter the continue statement and hence will never reach the decrement statement. So it will run infinite times

incorrect.value: Since n is 7 initially, it will encounter the continue statement and hence will never reach the decrement statement. So it will run infinite times
